attributes.action: Stop illegal immigrant’s crossing the channel
attributes.additional_details: Because our nation has had enough of taxpayers money being spent on hotel accommodation for people who are here illegally. Also each person who enters the UK illegally should be detained under the terrorism act until proven who they are and why they have entered the uk illegally
attributes.background: Use its powers to return anyone crossing the English Channel

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641012
